message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.MA, cs.DS, cs.AI 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - The paper focuses on exploiting social networks for viral marketing, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.SOC (Computational Social Science) - The paper deals with social influence and opinion-based scenarios, which are relevant topics in this sub-category. 
3. cs.MA (Multiagent Systems) - The paper proposes an influence maximization model for identifying influencers, which is a common problem in multiagent systems. 
4. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper proposes six influence measures and uses a maximization model, which are topics related to data structures and algorithms. 
5. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper proposes a model for viral marketing, which can be considered as an application of AI techniques in marketing.
